description: Humus Abonos Orgánicos y Soluciones Ecológicas (HUAOS) SAS, founded in 2004, focuses on transforming organic waste into agricultural substrates and soil conditioners. The initiative aims to help industries comply with environmental regulations by properly managing organic matter, preventing landfill disposal. With a commitment to sustainability, the family-run business has evolved over 21 years, emphasizing the importance of environmental responsibility and community engagement while continuously adapting to market needs and challenges.
name: HUAOS
